## Interdisciplinary is a communication and architecture practice developing creative strategies to empower the community trough art and design. 

Founded in 2015 by Adalberto Lonardi, we specialise in architecture and visual communication concepts focused on the social needs of tomorrow. We seek simple, straightforward solutions, bold aesthetics, and meaningful narratives to develop projects that will contribute to the empowerment of the community. A balanced combination of creativity and methodology describe the approach to our everyday design.
